basics.name: Sandra Gärtner
basics.label: Public Health Scientist | Complementary & Integrative Medicine
basics.summary:
Public health scientist with knowledge in evidence-based complementary and alternative medicine (CAM). Strong interest in social sustainability and holistic societal development, with the conviction that interdisciplinary and cross-sectoral collaboration is the key to success.

Solid background and education in business management and business development with the ability to maintain an overall perspective. Reflective, analytical, and inclusive approach well suited for addressing complex societal challenges. Creative, curious, and driven with the desire to create a safe, secure, and thriving world.

work.name: Sophiahemmet University College
work.summary: Conduct quantitative data collection and analysis within a randomized research project on digital MediYoga for atrial fibrillation. Work involves participant contact, questionnaire and health data, report support, as well as ongoing research administration.

work.name: Regional Cancer Centre Stockholm Gotland
work.summary: Project administrator for the event Swedish Forum for Integrative Cancer Care V, as well as research assistant in the evaluation of educational initiatives in complementary and alternative medicine for healthcare professionals and cancer patients.

work.name: Self-Employed
work.position: Restorative Yoga Teacher and Reiki Master
work.summary:
Explore the intersection between science and spirituality by critically examining practices such as yoga, meditation, breathing, and energy medicine with an evidence-based approach. Previously guided hundreds of individuals through courses, individual sessions, retreats, and group work.

Today, offer the concept 'Rest in Reiki', a calming program focused on stillness and recovery, combining restorative yoga, meditation, reiki, and soothing breathing exercises.

work.name: Regional Cancer Centre Stockholm Gotland
work.summary: Supported the development of the support process for Integrative Cancer Care and initiated the evaluation of educational initiatives in complementary and alternative medicine for healthcare professionals and cancer patients.

work.name: Healthfulness Podcast
work.summary: Development of the popular health podcast focused on holistic health together with the founder. Main focus was strategy work and research with many points of contact, and occasionally interviewing guests.

work.name: Web Tech Media Group STHLM AB
work.summary: As Vice CEO and HR Manager, focused on business development, business controlling, and HR strategy. Budgeting, forecasting, and follow-up with associated management group work.

work.name: Web Tech Media Group STHLM AB
work.summary: Business-developing HR Manager (Heart Manager) responsible for recruitment, employer branding, overall company health, and personnel development. Strong focus on personal development and coaching leadership.

work.name: H&M Home
work.summary: Product development targeting old and new customer groups through business tools. Ongoing budget strategy, statistics follow-up, business analysis, and forecast analysis. To some extent overseeing logistics flow and establishing and maintaining strong supplier relationships. Participated in the launch of H&M Classic collection.

work.name: Ferratum Group
work.position: Soft Collection Team Manager & Loan Officer
work.summary: Customer service employee and group-leading debt collection handler.
